sn28.2:1.2: Addasa kho ayasma anando …pe… ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn28.2:1.3: “vippasannani kho te, avuso sariputta, indriyani; parisuddho mukhavanno pariyodato.
sn28.2:2.1: “Idhaham, avuso, vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn28.2:2.2: Tassa mayham, avuso, na evam hoti:
sn28.2:2.3: ‘aham dutiyam jhanam samapajjami’ti va ‘aham dutiyam jhanam samapanno’ti va ‘aham dutiya jhana vutthito’ti va”ti.
sn28.2:2.4: Tatha hi panayasmato sariputtassa digharattam ahankaramamankaramananusaya susamuhata.
sn28.2:2.5: Tasma ayasmato sariputtassa na evam hoti:
sn28.2:2.6: “‘aham dutiyam jhanam samapajjami’ti va ‘aham dutiyam jhanam samapanno’ti va ‘aham dutiya jhana vutthito’ti va”ti.
